brief_summary.textblock:
This study will measure the effectiveness and any side effects of LY317615 in patients with
      Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (a sub-type of Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma).

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Oral LY317615 in Relapsed or Refractory Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphomas.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  A diagnosis of recurrent or refractory Diffuse B-cell Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma.

          -  Adequate organ functions.

          -  Able to swallow capsules.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  More than 3 prior treatments for this disease.

          -  Serious heart problems.

intervention.description: 500 mg, oral, daily, up to six 28 day cycles

facility.name: For additional information regarding investigative sites for this trial, contact 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559, 1-317-615-4559) Mon-Fri from 9AM to 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST), or speak with your personal physician.

For additional information regarding investigative sites for this trial, contact 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559, 1-317-615-4559) Mon-Fri from 9AM to 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST), or speak with your personal physician.

For additional information regarding investigative sites for this trial, contact 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559, 1-317-615-4559) Mon-Fri from 9AM to 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST), or speak with your personal physician.

clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2 Evaluation of Oral LY317615 in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma

overall_official.last_name: Call 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559) or 1-317-615-4559 Mon - Fri 9 AM - 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST)

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: Estimate the clinical response rate in patients with relapsed or refractory DLBCL who have received LY317615

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: time of response to progressive disease

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate safety of LY317615 in this population
Assess PKC beta expression by immunohistochemistry in readily assessable DLBCL tumors from patients

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
